content: If only trees and rocks would grow in clusters... {A灵光一现}then we wouldn't have to run around looking for them... Hee-baa, just a thought that came to me when I saw you searching with the mattock.
info: 日常对话-日常引入语-非首次对话-2-9次对话-玩家手持斧头-12绵朵_引入语

content: Mattock, so sharp... Better to hold it in my hands. Baa-mm... {A惊讶}Nope, there's no way I can hide it in my hair.
info: 日常对话-日常引入语-非首次对话-2-9次对话-玩家手持斧头-12绵朵_引入语
